answers.answer: It may not be from an "old" infection.  Lupus, Scleroderma, pancreatitis, vasculitis, and other conditions usually are associated with one or more active, chronic infections.You should consider testing to rule in or out various chronic infections.  A list of potential infections can be found on our website, immed.org, under Clinical Testing.
